name: The Shadows (DarkXNocturn)
description:
The Shadow is a platformer game made for the spooky 2d jam 2021.  You are a boy that is scapeing from a shadow thats try to catch you!

Controls:

A or right arrow: to move rigt. D or left arrow; to move left. Space to jump.

Team:

Alvaro99 (Design and art 2D), TimeLadySuu (art 2D), DarkXNocturn (2D), Doborujho(2D), CrovettoDEV(Programmer) and Bureg(Programmer).

It's our first game and our first game Jam too. We hope you enjoy it.

Credits:

Music: https://open.spotify.com/artist/4kdsn5PjMJyWUBNNUe49QY?autoplay=true

Sound effects: CC Zero (CC0). Twitter: @_dstrm.

Font: https://fontkong.com/product/kricky-100-free/
